| History                 = The New Saints were a biker gang that was involved in the drug trade, specifically methamphetamine. They were rivals of the [[Burning Sons (Earth-616)|Burning Sons]] and its members had a history with the Burning Sons' leader [[Henry McLaury (Earth-616)|Horrorshow]]. His meth addicted wife left him for a New Saints meth cook, both of whom later died from drug overdoses. Horrorshow's meth using [[Henry McLaury, Jr. (Earth-616)|son]] joined the New Saints and was involved in dealing meth.{{r|Wolverine Vol 3 73|74}}
